mapper.select: select count(r.reservation_no) from sharing_reservation r, sharing_status s where r.reservation_no=s.reservation_no and r.member_id=#{value} and (s.status='예약' or s.status='이용요금결제')

SELECT car_model, car_nick_name, reservation_no, to_char(rental_date,'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as rental_date, to_char(return_date,'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as return_date, status, rental_price FROM ( SELECT car_model, car_nick_name, reservation_no, rental_date, return_date, status, CEIL(rownum/10) AS page, rental_price FROM ( select c.car_model, c.car_nick_name, r.reservation_no, r.rental_date, r.return_date, s.status, r.rental_price from sharing_reservation r, car c, car_model_info m, sharing_status s where r.member_id=#{memberVO.memberId} and r.car_no=c.car_no and c.car_model=m.car_model and r.reservation_no=s.reservation_no and (s.status='예약' or s.status='이용요금결제') order by r.rental_date ) ) WHERE PAGE=#{historyPageNo}

SELECT car_model, car_nick_name, reservation_no, to_char(rental_date,'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as rental_date, to_char(return_date,'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as return_date, status, rental_price, to_char(extension_date,'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') as extension_date, extension_price, late_fee FROM ( SELECT car_model, car_nick_name, reservation_no, rental_date, return_date, status, CEIL(rownum/10) AS page, rental_price, extension_date, extension_price, late_fee FROM ( select c.car_model, c.car_nick_name, r.reservation_no, r.rental_date, r.return_date, s.status, r.rental_price, r.extension_date, r.extension_price , r.late_fee from sharing_reservation r, car c, car_model_info m, sharing_status s where r.member_id=#{memberVO.memberId} and r.car_no=c.car_no and c.car_model=m.car_model and r.reservation_no=s.reservation_no and (s.status='이용중' or s.status='주행요금결제' or s.status='반납' or s.status='연장' or s.status='완료' or s.status='연체') order by r.rental_date desc ) ) WHERE PAGE=#{historyPageNo}

select count(r.reservation_no) from sharing_reservation r, sharing_status s where r.reservation_no=s.reservation_no and r.member_id=#{value} and (s.status='이용중' or s.status='주행요금결제' or s.status='반납' or s.status='연장' or s.status='완료' or s.status='연체')
mapper.update: update sharing_status set status=#{sharingStatus} where reservation_no=#{reservationNo}
mapper.insert: insert into sharing_return(reservation_no, driving_price, mileage, return_ucar_zone_name, real_return_date) values(#{reservationNo}, #{returnVO.mileage}*(select driving_fee from sharing_reservation r, car c, car_model_info m where c.car_no=r.car_no and m.car_model=c.car_model and r.reservation_no=#{reservationNo}), #{returnVO.mileage}, (select return_ucar_zone_name from sharing_reservation where reservation_no=#{reservationNo}), sysdate)
mapper.select: select r.reservation_no from sharing_reservation r, sharing_status s where r.rental_date<to_date(#{extensionDate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') and r.car_no=(select car_no from sharing_reservation where reservation_no=#{reservationNo}) and r.rental_date>to_date(#{returnDate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI') and r.reservation_no=s.reservation_no and (s.status!='취소' or s.status!='완료')

select m.rental_fee*((to_date(#{extensionDate},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI')-to_date(#{returnDate},'YYYY/MM/DD DY HH24:MI'))*24*60/10) as extension_price from sharing_reservation r, car c, car_model_info m where r.reservation_no=#{reservationNo} and r.car_no=c.car_no and c.car_model=m.car_model
mapper.update: update sharing_reservation set extension_date=to_date(#{extensionDate},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'), extension_price=#{extensionPrice} where reservation_no=#{reservationNo}
mapper.select: select r.reservation_no, to_char(r.rental_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') as rental_date, to_char(r.return_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') as return_date, to_char(r.extension_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') as extension_date, s.status, r.late_time from sharing_reservation r, sharing_status s where r.reservation_no=s.reservation_no and (s.status!='취소' or s.status!='완료')
